channel.title: [Censored] Gamers Say
channel.itunes:subtitle: Joe Bota, Sydney Harmon, and Peter Samyn talk about video games and gaming news.
channel.itunes:author: Joe Bota, Sydney Harmon, Peter Samyn
channel.itunes:summary: Friends discuss their own warped opinions about video games and gaming news. Sometimes right, but often wrong.
channel.description: Joe Bota, Sydney Harmon, and Peter Samyn talk dirty about video games and video game news.

item.title: [Censored] Gamers Say Episode 4: I MIGHT BE A WEABOO
item.itunes:author: Joe Bota, Sydney Harmon, Peter Samyn
item.itunes:subtitle: What has happened? Why can't I swear? My ears are bleeding! Also, Peter discusses his return to the lusty Soul Calibur Lost Swords, Joe takes another trip down nostalgia lane with Theatrhythm Curtain Call and Final Fantasy Tactics: War of the Lions, Sydney expresses disappointment with the Microsoft acquisition of Mojang, and everyone realizes what a weirdo Joe is.
item.itunes:summary: What has happened? Why can't I swear? My ears are bleeding! Also, Peter discusses his return to the lusty Soul Calibur Lost Swords, Joe takes another trip down nostalgia lane with Theatrhythm Curtain Call and Final Fantasy Tactics: War of the Lions, Sydney expresses disappointment with the Microsoft acquisition of Mojang, and everyone realizes what a weirdo Joe is.
